titles.title: A bill to require that the Director of the Office of Management and Budget include a reference to Easton, Pennsylvania, in the official title of the metropolitan statistical area of which it is a part.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/9/1988--Introduced. Requires the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to include a reference to Easton, Pennsylvania, in the official title of the metropolitan statistical area of which it is a part.
